issue_title: [Bug] Todo.__init__ accepts empty or whitespace-only text, but rename() rejects it - i
fix_summary: Added text validation in Todo.__post_init__ to reject empty or whitespace-only text, making constructor validation consistent with rename() method
approach: Minimal fix - Added validation in __post_init__ method to check for empty/whitespace-only text and raise ValueError with message 'Todo text cannot be empty', matching the validation logic in rename() method. Also strips leading/trailing whitespace from text to maintain consistency.
